Support.mvc

Class TController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.mvc.TController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, IController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameController, TNavigator

    public abstract class TController
extends Object
implements IController, PropertyChangeListener
    Generalised implementation of controller component specified by IController interface.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

      • propertyChange

        public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
        Delegates property change event to the view components from the model component.
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • setModelProperty

        protected void setModelProperty(String propertyName,
                                Object newValue)
                         throws TError
        This is a convenience method that subclasses can call upon to fire property changes back to the models. This method uses reflection to inspect each of the model classes to determine whether it is the owner of the property in question. If it isn't, a NoSuchMethodException is thrown, which the method ignores.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - The name of the property.
        newValue - An object that represents the new value of the property.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
